name: ContextMenu
purpose: Provide object-specific actions triggered by right-click or long-press.
useWhen: Actions apply to a specific object or region
User invokes actions via pointer context
Advanced or power-user interactions are appropriate
rules: Actions are scoped to the target object
doNotUseWhen: Primary or discoverable actions are required
Interactive layouts or forms are needed (use Popover)
aiHints: ContextMenu should supplement visible UI, not replace it
Do not rely on ContextMenu for core workflows
